attributes.action: Protect the lives of refugees trying to reach the UK by boat
attributes.additional_details: The proposed action to turn back boats containing refugees from France is probably against Maritime Law but certainly puts at risk the lives from drowning of innocent people including women and children.Process potential migrants at the border but don’t help to kill them!
attributes.background: Avoid intercepting and turning back boats containing refugees in the English Channel

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Reform policy on Channel Crossings and create safe routes for refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596722

Do not implement policies to turn around migrant boats crossing the Channel: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596718
